body.name: Sensyne 12" Ring Light with 62" Tripod Stand, LED Selfie Circle Light with Strong Magnectic Phone Holder Compatible with Cellphones for Live Stream/Recording/Photography/YouTube/TikTok
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 9 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Powerful Magnetic Phone Holder: Versatile and Compatible. Liberates your phone from width and weight limitations. Works seamlessly with iPhone 12/13/14/15 series. Comes with 2 adhesive metal ring stickers for other smartphones that aren't compatible with magnetic holders. Enjoy secure and convenient phone placement without any compromises.

Sensitive Touchpad Control: Vibrant Colors at Your Fingertips. Choose from our LED ring light's 5 vibrant color options, each with 10 levels of adjustable brightness. Effortlessly customize your lighting using the sensitive touchpad. Perfect for content creation, video calls, and makeup applications. Elevate your lighting game with ease and precision.

Versatile Adjustable Tripod Stand: Elevate Your Setup. Easily adjust the height of this tripod stand, ranging from 16" to 62". Capture perfect angles with the 180° rotating tripod head. It features a universal 1/4" screw for seamless compatibility with cameras or ring lights. Crafted from solid, high-class metal for exceptional durability and stability.

Perfect Assistance for Creator: Sensyne newly upgraded Ring Light Kit is a game-changer for facetimers, TikTokers, vloggers, and makeup artists. With its 12-inch ring light and 62-inch tripod stand, it delivers impeccable lighting for flawless videos, stunning makeup looks, and captivating content creation.

Package Contents & Service: 1 X 12" ring light, 1 X 62" phone tripod, 1 X wireless remote, 1 X phone holder, 2 X adhesive metal ring stickers, 1 X USB cable, and 1 X user manual. Rest easy with a 1-year warranty. Our dedicated 24/7 customer service team is available to assist you in case of any incomplete or defective product. Your satisfaction is our priority.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Ring Light with Stand - A Must-Have for Perfect Lighting!"
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Ring Light with Stand, and it has exceeded all my expectations. As an aspiring content creator, good lighting is crucial for my videos and photos, and this ring light has been a game-changer for my content production.The adjustable stand is sturdy and easy to set up, providing the perfect height and angle for my lighting needs. I can position it just right to eliminate shadows and highlight my face or subjects flawlessly. The dimmable feature is a fantastic addition, allowing me to control the intensity of the light to match different environments and moods.The ring light's even and soft illumination enhances my skin tone and makes my videos and selfies look professional. It's perfect for beauty vlogs, makeup tutorials, product shots, and more. Plus, the included smartphone holder is incredibly handy for hands-free recording and live streaming.The build quality is top-notch, and I can tell it will last for a long time. The added bonus is the portability - I can easily pack it up and take it with me on the go.Overall, the Ring Light with Stand has elevated the quality of my content and boosted my confidence as a creator. If you're looking to improve your lighting setup, this ring light is a must-have investment. It's a game-changer and worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible ring light.
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the sturdiest ring light i’ve ever bought. and the tallest. the tripod came assembled there was literally nothing to it other than adjusting length and adding the ring light and phone holder. the magnet is STRONG and hold my 14pro max easily. i have a magsafe case so i didn’t need the rings but it comes with two and those are sturdy too. the light is nice and bright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and sturdy! VERY responsive remote!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great quality ring light! I put it together immediately. SUPER easy assembly and instructions. Nice variety of brightness levels and tones. The Bluetooth remote is very responsive. Also very STURDY, without any of that wobbly crap. The magnetic phone holder is SOLID and stays put. Winner, winner, chicken dinner. Yup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price, but would recommend for daily usage
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Pros: easy installation, great lighting options, good priceCons: wobbly, have to tighten it between each usage, has to be plugged into wall for to use the lightOverall a good purchase but if you are using this daily multiple times, might want something sturdier and battery powered.

If you do LEGO builds or anything facing down towards a table you are in luck!It Angles! The light is amazing! It comes with a remote!It’s the best set up I ever got for creating content 🖤

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great light type options and I love that the height is retractable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth your money - broke after first use.
reviews.reviewText: I read the reviews on this light and was excited to try it out after reading pretty good reviews for the price. The piece that holds the phone is not sturdy and does a poor job of holding upright without flopping down or to the side. After the first use, the light will not turn on. It only does a quick flash (like a camera flash) and turns off, even after being plugged in and attempting to charge it. I was not successful in getting the light to work again since. The lock on the tripod is also not very sturdy and allows the extension rod to slide down while using, despite fastening as tightly as I could get it. I found it to be incredibly frustrating to use, and due to the light not working anymore, I will not be able to use this item at all.I guess it was a shot in the dark given the price, but I would recommend getting something of better quality, if you are on the fence. I see this item as waste of money. I would personally invest in a light without a cord next time also, as the cord was pretty short and it was a pain to find a plug close enough to reach my workspace without extension cords, as well as trying to maneuver around it while filming.
